General.Name: Zhejiang Chengbang Landscape
General.Description: Chengbang Eco-Environment Co.,Ltd. primarily operates in the construction industry in China. The company undertakes contracting of municipal public works construction, ancient construction engineering, environmental protection engineering, landscape architecture engineering design, architectural design, and tourism planning and design works. Chengbang Eco-Environment Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Fan  Ye
1.Title: CFO, VP, Sec. to the Board & Director
